<vb:comment> Fetch css links. For use with AJAX calls that need to supply css <link> tags. Takes advantage of the stylesheet runtime to determine if we're using css stored as files or if we need to break down rollups into individual templates. cssFiles is an array. </vb:comment> {vb:cssExtra {vb:var cssFiles}}

<vb:comment>Profile Sidebar widget + Profile Widget or Profile Subscriptions Widget START</vb:comment>
/** 
	profile-widget-layout 
**/

/* subscribe, unsubscribe, subscribed button */
.follow_button{position:relative; }
.follow_button > .button-icon{top:8px;left:5px;}
.follow_button > .button-text-primary{top:5px;left:20px;}

.profile-widget-layout .profile-widget {
	width:100%;
	margin-bottom:0;
}
.profile-widget-layout .profile-sidebar-widget .widget-content {
	width:100%;
}
.profile-widget-layout .profile-widget .widget-content {
	padding:0 !important;
}
.profile-widget-layout .profile-widget .widget-content .profile-container .profileTabs {
	margin-bottom:1px !important;
}
.profile-widget-layout .profile-widget .widget-content .profile-container .profileTabs > .widget-tabs-nav,
.profile-widget-layout .profile-widget .widget-content .profile-container .profileTabs > .tab {
	margin:-1px !important;
}
.profile-widget-layout .profile-widget .widget-content .profile-container .profileTabs > .tab {
	-moz-border-radius-bottomleft:0 !important;
	-webkit-border-bottom-left-radius:0 !important;
	border-bottom-left-radius:0 !important;
}
.profile-widget-layout .profile-widget .widget-content .profile-container .profileTabs > .tab.about-tab {
	margin-bottom:-2px !important;
}
.profile-widget-layout .profile-widget .widget-content .profile-container .profileTabs > .tab > .pagenav-controls,
.profile-widget-layout .profile-widget .widget-content .profile-container .profileTabs > .tab > .pagenav-controls .pagenav-form {
	margin-top:-1px !important;
}
.profile-widget-layout .profile-widget .widget-content .profile-container .profileTabs > .tab > .pagenav-controls .pagenav-form {
	background: #FFF;
	margin: -1px 1px 1px;
}
.profile-widget-layout .profile-widget .widget-content .profile-container .profileTabs > .tab > .pagenav-controls .pagenav-form .see-all-btn {
	margin:0 0 24px 0 !important;
}
.profile-widget-layout .profile-widget .widget-content .profile-container .profileTabs .conversation-list {
	margin-bottom:-1px !important;
}
.profile-widget-layout .subscriptions-widget {
	width:100% !important;
}
.profile-widget-layout .subscriptions-widget .widget-content {
	padding:0 !important;
}
.profile-widget-layout .subscriptions-widget .widget-content .subscribeTabs {
	border: 0;
	padding: 0;
	margin: -1px;
}
.profile-widget-layout .widget-tabs .widget-tabs-panel .conversation-empty {
	clear: both;
	margin: 0 1px;
}
.profile-widget-layout .subscriptions-widget .widget-content .subscribeTabs > .tab {
	padding: 0;
}
.profile-widget-layout .subscriptions-widget .widget-content .subscribeTabs .groups-tab {
	border-width: 1px;
	border: {vb:stylevar module_content_border};
}
.profile-widget-layout .subscriptions-widget .widget-content .subscribeTabs .subscriptions-tab .conversation-toolbar-wrapper {
	position:relative;
}
.profile-widget-layout .subscriptions-widget .widget-content .subscribeTabs .conversation-toolbar-wrapper .back-button {
	margin-{vb:stylevar left}:0;
}
.profile-widget-layout .subscriptions-widget .widget-content .subscribeTabs .subscriptions-tab .conversation-toolbar-wrapper .toolbar-filter-overlay {
	width: auto;
	z-index: 1;
	position: absolute;
	{vb:stylevar right}: 0;
	top: 39px;
	padding: 20px 20px 0;
}
.profile-widget-layout .subscriptions-widget .widget-content .subscribeTabs .subscription-list-container {
	margin-top: -1px;
}
.profile-widget-layout .subscriptions-widget .widget-content .subscribeTabs .subscription-list-container .subscription-list-header {
	width: 99.8%;
	border: {vb:stylevar side_nav_border};
	background: {vb:stylevar side_nav_background};
	font-weight: bold;
}
.profile-widget-layout .subscriptions-widget .widget-content .subscribeTabs .subscription-list-container .subscription-list-header .arrow {
	cursor: pointer;
}
.profile-widget-layout .subscriptions-widget .widget-content .subscribeTabs .subscription-list-container .subscription-list-header .td {
	vertical-align: middle;
	padding: 0 14px;
	height: 35px !important;
}
.profile-widget-layout .subscriptions-widget .widget-content .subscribeTabs .subscription-list-container .subscription-list-header .td label {
	display: inline-block;
	height: 35px;
	line-height: 35px;
	float: {vb:stylevar left};
}
.profile-widget-layout .subscriptions-widget .widget-content .subscribeTabs .subscription-list-container .subscription-list-header .td .arrow {
	margin-top: 5px;
}
.profile-widget-layout .subscriptions-widget .widget-content .subscribeTabs .subscription-list-container .first_column {
	width: 65%;
}
.profile-widget-layout .subscriptions-widget .widget-content .subscribeTabs .subscription-list-container .second_column {
	width: 20%;
	white-space: nowrap;
}
.profile-widget-layout .subscriptions-widget .widget-content .subscribeTabs .subscription-list-container .third_column {
	width: 15%;
}
.profile-widget-layout .subscriptions-widget .widget-content .subscribeTabs .subscription-list-container .subscription-list {
	width: 99.8%;
	border: {vb:stylevar module_content_border};
	border-top: 0;
}
.profile-widget-layout .subscriptions-widget .widget-content .subscribeTabs .subscription-list-container .subscription-list .subscription-item {
	background:#FFF;
}
.profile-widget-layout .subscriptions-widget .widget-content .subscribeTabs .subscription-list-container.followers .subscription-list .subscription-item {
	height:55px;
}
.profile-widget-layout .subscriptions-widget .widget-content .subscribeTabs .subscription-list-container .subscription-list .subscription-item .td {
	height: 42px !important;
	vertical-align: middle;
	padding: 0 14px;
	border-top:{vb:stylevar module_content_border};
}
.profile-widget-layout .subscriptions-widget .widget-content .subscribeTabs .subscription-list-container .subscription-list .subscription-item:first-child .td {
	border-top:0;
}
.profile-widget-layout .subscriptions-widget .widget-content .subscribeTabs .subscription-list-container .subscription-list .subscription-item .td a {
	font-weight: bold;
}
.profile-widget-layout .subscriptions-widget .widget-content .subscribeTabs .subscription-list-container .subscription-list .subscription-item .td a.author {
	font-weight: normal;
	line-height:34px;
}
.profile-widget-layout .subscriptions-widget .widget-content .subscribeTabs .subscription-list-container .subscription-list .subscription-item .subscription-button {
	text-align: center;
}

<vb:comment>Profile Sidebar widget + Profile Widget or Profile Subscriptions Widget END</vb:comment>


<vb:comment> Profile sidebar widget START </vb:comment>
.profile-sidebar-widget {
	width:100%;
	background:transparent !important;
}
.profile-sidebar-widget .widget-content {
	padding: 10px;
	width: 100%;
}

#cropFrame .profile-photo-wrapper{
	overflow: hidden;
}
#cropFrame .profile-photo-wrapper > img{
	max-width:100% !important;
	max-height:100% !important;
	width:auto !important;
	height:auto !important;
}

.profile-sidebar-widget .profileContainer .profile-photo-wrapper {
	position: relative;
	max-width: 202px;
	max-height:202px;
	width:100%;
	height:100%;
}

.profile-sidebar-widget .profileContainer .profile-photo-wrapper .profile-photo {
	max-width: 200px;
	max-height: 200px;
	width: auto;
	height: auto;
	border: 1px solid {vb:stylevar side_nav_avatar_border};
}

.profile-sidebar-widget .profileContainer .profile-acct .username {
	font-weight:bold;
	font-size:18px;
	margin-top:14px;
	word-wrap: break-word;
}
.profile-sidebar-widget .profileContainer .profile-acct .edit-user-link {
	display: block;
	float: {vb:stylevar right};
	margin-top: 7px;
	/*Suppress the anchor text and add an image background*/
	overflow: hidden;
	white-space: nowrap;
	text-indent: 50px;
	width: 14px;
	height: 14px;
	background:transparent url(images/css/sprite_icons_vb.png) no-repeat scroll -207px -80px;
}
.profile-sidebar-widget .profileContainer .profile-acct .edit-user-link:hover {
	background:transparent url(images/css/sprite_icons_vb.png) no-repeat scroll -223px -80px;
}
.profile-sidebar-widget .profileContainer .status-update {
	margin: 10px 0;
	height: auto;
	min-height: 0;
	padding: 0;
}
.profile-sidebar-widget .profileContainer .profile-info  {
	font-size:12px;
	margin-bottom: 10px;
}
.profile-sidebar-widget .profileContainer .profile-info .profile-info-item {
	line-height:20px;
}
.profile-sidebar-widget .profile-menulist {
	border-top: {vb:stylevar side_nav_item_border_bottom};
	margin:0;
	width:100%;
}
.profile-sidebar-widget .profile-menulist .profile-menulist-item > a {
	display:block;
	font-weight:bold;
}
.profile-sidebar-widget .profile-menulist .profile-menulist-item > a > label {
	color: {vb:customstylevar profile_userpanel_textcolor.color, {vb:var userid}};
	cursor:pointer;
}
.profile-sidebar-widget .profile-menulist .profile-menulist-item > a > .subscriptions-count,
.profile-sidebar-widget .profile-menulist .profile-menulist-item .subscriptions-count {
	color:{vb:stylevar profilesidebar_count_text_color};
	padding:3px;
	border:1px solid #D4D6D7;
	display:inline-block;
	font-size:11px;
	min-width:16px;
	height: 16px;
	line-height: 16px;
	text-align: center;
	position: absolute;
	margin-top: -13px;
	top: 50%;
	{vb:stylevar right}: 10px;
	background: #FFF;
	-moz-border-radius:1px;
	-webkit-border-radius:1px;
	border-radius:1px;
}
.profile-action-buttons {
	border-top: {vb:stylevar side_nav_item_border_top};
	padding: 10px;
}

/* .profile-sidebar-widget .subscription-container */
.profile-sidebar-widget .subscription-container {
	position: relative;
}

.profile-sidebar-widget .subscription-container .subscription-text {
	position: absolute;
	{vb:stylevar left}: 1px;
}

.profile-sidebar-widget .subscription-container .subscription-link {
	position: absolute;
	{vb:stylevar right}: 5px;
}














#editProfilePhotoDlg .frmprofilePhoto h4 {
	margin-bottom:15px;
}
#editProfilePhotoDlg .profile-img-option-container {
	margin-bottom:18px;
}
#editProfilePhotoDlg .profile-img-option-container > label input {
	margin-{vb:stylevar left}:0;
	margin-{vb:stylevar right}:6px;
}
#editProfilePhotoDlg .profile-img-option-container .profile-img-option-field {
	margin-{vb:stylevar left}: 20px;
	margin-top: 5px;
}
#editProfilePhotoDlg .profile-img-option-container .profile-img-option-field > input {
	margin-{vb:stylevar left}:0;
	margin-{vb:stylevar right}:5px;
	float:{vb:stylevar left};
	width:70%;
}

/* #profCustom_contentButtons .profile-img-option-container, */
/* #profCustom_contentText .profile-img-option-container, */
/* #profCustom_contentHeader .profile-img-option-container, */
.profileTabs .profile-img-option-container {
  padding: 10px 18px;
}

.profileTabs {
  box-shadow: 2px 2px 5px rgba(0,0,0,0.1);
}

.default-avatar-container {
	margin-top: 15px;
	max-height:240px;
	overflow-y:auto;
}
.default-avatar-container .avatarHolder {
	width: 204px;
	height: auto;
	text-align: center;
	margin-bottom:20px;
	margin-{vb:stylevar right}:15px;
}
.default-avatar-container .avatarHolder .defaultAvatarSet
{
	border: 2px solid #E6E6E6;
	max-width:200px;
	max-height:200px;
	width:100%;
	height:100%;
	cursor:pointer;
}
.default-avatar-container .avatarHolder .defaultAvatarSet.defaultAvatarSelected
{
	border-color:#4455AA;
}
#editProfilePhotoDlg .action-buttons {
	text-align:{vb:stylevar right};
}
#editProfilePhotoDlg .action-buttons .upload-progress-bar {
	margin-top: 5px;
	margin-{vb:stylevar right}: 10px;
}
#editProfilePhotoDlg .profile-img-option-container .upload-progress-bar {
	margin-top: 5px;
	margin-bottom: 15px;
	text-align: {vb:stylevar left};
	margin-{vb:stylevar left}: 20px;
}
.profile-media-upload-dialog .content-entry-box {
	margin-top:0;
}
.profile-media-upload-dialog .content-entry-box .action-buttons  {
	text-align:{vb:stylevar right};
}
.profile-media-upload-dialog .content-entry-box .videoattach-container {
	width:93.8%;
}
.profile-media-upload-dialog .content-entry-box .videoattach-container .url {
	width:97%;
}


.profile-widget .post-footer-wrapper .post-footer ul li,
.profile-widget .conversation-list.stream-view .list-item-header .info .subscribed,
.canvas-layout-container .canvas-widget .widget-content .profileTabs .post-date
{
	color: {vb:customstylevar profile_content_secondarytext.color, {vb:var userid}};
	border-color: inherit;
}

.profile-widget .widget-tabs.ui-tabs .ui-widget-content a,
.profile-widget .widget-tabs.ui-tabs .ui-widget-content a:active,
.profile-widget  .widget-tabs.ui-tabs .ui-widget-content a:visited
{
	color: {vb:customstylevar profile_content_linktext.color, {vb:var userid}};
}

.profile_sidebar_content .button.primary {
    color: {vb:customstylevar profilesidebar_button_text_color.color, {vb:var userid}};
    border-color: {vb:customstylevar profilesidebar_button_border.color, {vb:var userid}};
    background-image: {vb:customstylevar profilesidebar_button_background.image, {vb:var userid}};
    background-color: {vb:customstylevar profilesidebar_button_background.color, {vb:var userid}};
    background-repeat: {vb:customstylevar profilesidebar_button_background.repeat, {vb:var userid}};
}
.profile_sidebar_content {
	background-image: {vb:customstylevar side_nav_background.image, {vb:var userid}};
	background-color: {vb:customstylevar side_nav_background.color, {vb:var userid}};
	background-repeat: {vb:customstylevar side_nav_background.repeat, {vb:var userid}};
	color: {vb:customstylevar profile_userpanel_textcolor.color, {vb:var userid}};
	border-color: {vb:customstylevar form_dropdown_border.color, {vb:var userid}};
	font-family: {vb:customstylevar profile_userpanel_font.family, {vb:var userid}};
}
.profileSidebar .profile-sidebar-widget .profileContainer .profile-photo-wrapper .profile-photo {
	border-color: {vb:customstylevar side_nav_avatar_border.color, {vb:var userid}};
}
.profile-sidebar-widget .profileContainer .profile-photo-wrapper .profile-photo {
	vertical-align: baseline;
}
.profile-sidebar-widget .profileContainer {
	padding: 10px;
}
.profileSidebar .profile_sidebar_content a, 
.profileSidebar .profile_sidebar_content a:hover,
.profileSidebar .profile_sidebar_content a:visited,
.profile-sidebar-widget .profile-menulist .profile-menulist-item .subscriptions-count,
.profile-sidebar-widget .profile-menulist .profile-menulist-item a,
.profile-sidebar-widget .profile-menulist .profile-menulist-item a:visited {
	color: {vb:customstylevar profile_userpanel_linkcolor.color, {vb:var userid}};
}
.profile-sidebar-widget .profile-menulist .profile-menulist-item {
	position:relative;
	height:29px;
	line-height:29px;
	border-top: {vb:stylevar side_nav_item_border_top};
	border-bottom: {vb:stylevar side_nav_item_border_bottom};
	padding:0 10px;
}
/* profile page buttons */
.profile-sidebar-widget .profile-menulist .profile-action-buttons a.button:hover {text-decoration:none;}
.profile-sidebar-widget .profile-menulist .profile-action-buttons a.button,
.profile-sidebar-widget .profile-menulist .profile-action-buttons button {
	background: url("images/css/sprite_gradients_vb.png") repeat-x scroll 0 -250px #D5E8EE;
	border-color: #C8CCCE;
	color: #09161b !important;
}


<vb:comment> Profile sidebar widget END</vb:comment>




.profileTabs .section .section-header
{
	background-image: {vb:customstylevar profile_section_background.image, {vb:var userid}};
	background-color: {vb:customstylevar profile_section_background.color, {vb:var userid}};
	border-color: {vb:customstylevar profile_section_border.color, {vb:var userid}};
	color: {vb:customstylevar profile_section_text_color.color, {vb:var userid}};
	font-family: {vb:customstylevar profile_section_font.family, {vb:var userid}};
	font-size: {vb:customstylevar profile_section_font.size, {vb:var userid}};
}

 */

 */

 */

 */

 */

 */

{

.profileTabs .ui-helper-clearfix {

.profileNavTabs
{

input.colorPicker {

.profileNavTabs,

{
	background: #e5e5e5 none;

	padding: 0;

{

}

}

}

  margin-right: 3px;
}

.profileNavTabs label {
  padding: 0 10px;
  display: inline-block;

}

.profileNavTabs label:hover {

}

.profileNavOuter > li {
  float: none;

}

.profileNavOuter .icon {
  background: transparent url(images/css/sprite_icons_vb.png) no-repeat;

  margin-right: 5px;
  display: inline-block;
  vertical-align: middle;
}

.icon.profCustom_navbar { background-position: -400px -176px; }
.ui-tabs-selected .icon.profCustom_navbar { background-position: -416px -176px; }

.icon.profCustom_content { background-position: -432px -176px; }
.ui-tabs-selected .icon.profCustom_content { background-position: -448px -176px; }

.icon.profCustom_user { background-position: -464px -176px; }

.icon.profCustom_admin { background-position: -496px -176px; }

<vb:comment>responsive:css - media queries:images</vb:comment>
<vb:comment>/* sprite for menu sections */
</vb:comment>
	#mobile-main-menu-sections .sections-menu-icon .icon,
	#mobile-main-menu-sections .sections-icon .icon,
	#mobile-main-menu-sections .selected-sections-icon .icon,
	#channel-tabbar ul li .mobile.dropdown-icon .icon
		{background: url("images/css/ico_vb_responsive.png") repeat-x scroll transparent;}	

	#searchForm fieldset label {background: url("images/css/ico_vb_responsive.png") repeat-x scroll transparent;}
	#searchForm fieldset .search-btn {background: url("images/css/ico_vb_responsive.png") repeat-x scroll transparent;}
	
	@media only screen and (max-width:767px) {
		
		#channel-tabbar ul li.section-item,
		#channel-tabbar ul li.section-item a,
		.profile-settings-widget .settingsTabs ul li,
		.profile-settings-widget .settingsTabs ul li a
		{background: url("images/css/gradients_vb_responsive.png") repeat-x scroll transparent;}
		
	}
	

<vb:comment>responsive:css - media queries:channel-tabbar:images</vb:comment>
@media only screen and (max-width:767px) {
		
	<vb:comment>/* search icon */
</vb:comment>
	#mobile-main-menu .mobile-search .icon {
		background: url("images/css/ico_vb_responsive.png") repeat-x scroll -64px -0px transparent;
	}
	
}

<vb:comment>responsive:css - media queries:page footer</vb:comment>
#footer-tabbar > ul.chooser-list > li.rx-list-to-select,
#footer-tabbar > ul.chooser-list > li.rx-list-to-select.rx-menu-limit-exceeded,
#footer-tabbar > ul.chooser-list > li.rx-list-to-select.rx-menu-limit-ok{display:none;}
#footer-tabbar > ul.nav-list.rx-menu-limit-exceeded,
#footer-tabbar > ul.nav-list.rx-menu-limit-ok{display:block;}

@media only screen and (max-width:767px) {
	#footer-tabbar {height:auto;}
	#footer-tabbar > ul.nav-list {margin-{vb:stylevar right}:0;padding-bottom:10px;}
	#footer-tabbar > ul.nav-list,
	#footer-tabbar > ul.nav-list > li {width:100%;height:auto;line-height:normal;}
	#footer-tabbar > ul.chooser-list > li.rx-list-to-select.rx-menu-limit-exceeded{display:block;}
	#footer-tabbar > ul.chooser-list > li.rx-list-to-select.rx-menu-limit-ok,
	#footer-tabbar > ul.chooser-list > li.rx-list-to-select.rx-menu-limit-ok select{display:none;}
	#footer-tabbar > ul.nav-list.rx-menu-limit-exceeded{display:none;}
	#footer-tabbar > ul.nav-list.rx-menu-limit-ok{display:block;}
	
	<vb:comment>/* display the footer menu select boxes vertically to allow horizontal room */</vb:comment>
	#footer-tabbar > ul.chooser-list {width:100%;margin-{vb:stylevar left}:0;}	
	#footer-tabbar > ul.chooser-list > li {margin:0;padding:5px 10px 0;float:none;height:auto;line-height:32px;}
	.ie9 #footer-tabbar ul.chooser-list > li {line-height: 32px;}
	
	<vb:comment>/* set background and text color for menu bar view */</vb:comment>
	#footer-tabbar > ul.nav-list > li a	{font-size:inherit;border-{vb:stylevar left}:0;margin-{vb:stylevar left}:0;padding:10px 10px 0;display:block;}
	
	#footer-vb-copyright, #footer-user-copyright {padding-{vb:stylevar right}:0;}
	
	<vb:comment>/* hide admincp menu */</vb:comment>
	#footer-tabbar .rx-hide{display:none;}
	
}

<vb:comment>responsive:css - media queries:general media queries
/* remove link to edit picture modals */</vb:comment>
#editProfilePicture,.profile-media-upload{display:none;}
html.fileinput .profile-photo-wrapper:hover #editProfilePicture,
html.fileinput .profile-media-upload{display:block;}


<vb:comment>/* Customize My Theme panels */</vb:comment>
@media only screen and (max-width:900px) {

	.profile_custom_edit .profileEditContent > ul.profileNavOuter {
		display:block;
		width:auto;
		float:none;
		margin:0 10px;
		-webkit-border-radius:0;
		-moz-border-radius:0;
		border-radius:0;
	}
	
	<vb:comment>/* Apply clearfix */</vb:comment>
	ul.profileNavOuter:before,ul.profileNavOuter:after {content:" "; display:table;}
	ul.profileNavOuter:after{clear:both;}

	.profileNavTabs .profileNavOuter li {
		float:{vb:stylevar left};
		width: auto;
		height: auto;
		margin: 0 1px 0 0;
	}
  
	.ui-tabs .ui-tabs-nav li.ui-tabs-selected{padding-bottom:0;}
	.profile_custom_edit .profileEditContent > .profileNavOuter li a {
		display: inline-block;
		width: auto;
		height: auto;
		padding: 5px 12px;
		border-top-{vb:stylevar left}-radius: 3px;
		border-bottom-{vb:stylevar left}-radius: 0;
		border-top-{vb:stylevar right}-radius: 3px;
		border-bottom-{vb:stylevar right}-radius: 0;
	}
	
	.profile_custom_edit .profileEditContent > .profileNavOuter li a span{display:inline;}
	.profileNavTabs .profileEditContent > .tab {margin:0 10px 10px !important;}
	.profile_custom_edit .profileEditContent >  .ui-widget-content {
		border-top-{vb:stylevar left}-radius: 0;
		border-bottom-{vb:stylevar left}-radius: 3px;
		border-top-{vb:stylevar right}-radius: 0;
		border-bottom-{vb:stylevar right}-radius: 3px;
	}

	.profile_custom_edit .profileEditContent > div .ui-widget-content{padding: 10px !important;}
}

@media only screen and (max-width:420px) {

	.profile_custom_edit .profileEditContent > .profileNavOuter li a {
		padding: 5px 8px;
	}
  
}

@media only screen and (max-width:767px) {

	<vb:comment>/* remove search container for mobile view - search will be presented in different form in different location */</vb:comment>
	#header .toolbar.right .left li.search-container{display:none;}
}

@media only screen and (max-width:480px) {
	.forum_disabled {margin-{vb:stylevar right}:10px; margin-{vb:stylevar left}:10px;}

	<vb:comment>/* hide moderation checkbox */</vb:comment>
	.conversation-body-wrapper > .checkbox > input.cb_inlinemod {display:none;}
	
	<vb:comment>/* resize modal dailog for mobile display */</vb:comment>
	.alert-dialog-container{width:93% !important;}
	.dialog-container.dialog-box .dialog-content .message {width:75%;}
	
	<vb:comment>/* forgot password page */</vb:comment>
	.canvas-layout-container .canvas-widget .widget-header {margin:0 !important;}
	.canvas-layout-container .canvas-widget .widget-header .module-title {
	  margin-top:5px;
  }
	.rightEdit,
	.leftCaption{float:none;padding:0;display:block;margin-top:10px;}
	.leftCaption{text-align:{vb:stylevar left};}
	#frmLostpw .action-buttons{text-align:{vb:stylevar left};margin-top:20px;}
	#frmLostpw .stretch{margin-{vb:stylevar left}:10px;}
	#frmLostpw div:first-child{width:95%;}
	
	<vb:comment>
	/* private message form */
	/* .private-message-widget{margin-top:10px !important;} */
	</vb:comment>
	#newPMForm > div{display:inline-block;margin-bottom:20px}
	#newPMForm  .entry-field{width:90%;}
	.linkurl-container .button-wrapper button,
	#newPMForm  .action-buttons button{
		background:none;
		float:none;
		margin-{vb:stylevar left}:0;
		margin-top:10px;
		margin-bottom:10px;
		background-color:#2379B5;
		color:#fff !important;
		-moz-border-radius:2px;
		-webkit-border-radius:2px;
		border-radius:2px;
		cursor: pointer;
		border: {vb:stylevar button_primary_border};
	}
	<vb:comment>/*#newPMForm div.action-buttons{width:100%;}*/</vb:comment>
	
}

<vb:comment>
/* header elements: remove edit, resize logo */
/* Delta: 16 px, 555px here is same as 539px in body width() */
/*@media only screen and (max-width:440px) {#header .site-logo img{width:170%;}}*/
</vb:comment>

@media only screen and (max-width:440px) {
	<vb:comment>/* #header .site-logo img{width:80%;} */</vb:comment>
	#header .site-logo.header-edit-box{padding-{vb:stylevar left}:8px;padding-{vb:stylevar right}:8px}
}

<vb:comment>/* @media only screen and (max-width:767px) {.widget-content{font-size:.92em}} */</vb:comment>



<vb:comment>
/* ==========================================================================
   General responsiveness
   ========================================================================== */
</vb:comment>

  img { 
    max-width:100% !important; 
    height: auto;
  }



<vb:comment>
/* ==========================================================================
   Body and wrappers
   ========================================================================== */

/**
* Our overriding goal here is to allow a range of flexible widths between
* a minimum and maximum size.
*/
</vb:comment>

#outer-wrapper {
  margin: 0 20px;
}

#wrapper {
  <vb:comment>/* Make wrapper flexible width */</vb:comment>
  width: 100%;
  <vb:comment>/* Fix so inner page doesn't exceed 1200px */</vb:comment>
  max-width:1200px;
  <vb:comment>/* Don't let inner page go below iPhone portrait width */</vb:comment>
  min-width:320px;
}


@media only screen and (max-width:767px) {
  #outer-wrapper {
    margin: 0;
  }
}


<vb:comment>
/* ==========================================================================
   Main nav bar
   ========================================================================== */
</vb:comment>

#main-navbar-wrapper {
  -webkit-box-sizing: border-box;
  -moz-box-sizing: border-box;
  box-sizing: border-box;
  padding-{vb:stylevar left}: 10px;
  padding-{vb:stylevar right}: 10px;
}

#main-navbar {
  width: 100%;
  max-width:1200px;
  min-width:320px;
}

@media only screen and (max-width:767px) {
  #main-navbar-wrapper {
    padding-{vb:stylevar left}: 0px;
    padding-{vb:stylevar right}: 0px;
  }
}




<vb:comment>
/* ==========================================================================
   Content
   ========================================================================== */
</vb:comment>

@media only screen and (max-width:480px) {
  #content {
    /* Bump down the margins to make more space for content */
    padding-{vb:stylevar left}:  10px;
    padding-{vb:stylevar right}: 10px;
  }
}

<vb:comment>
/* ==========================================================================
   Columns
   ========================================================================== */
</vb:comment>

.canvas-layout-row .no-columns { display: none; }

<vb:comment>
/**
* Once we are under iPad portait width (768px), collapse the columns into
* a single stream.
*/
</vb:comment>
@media only screen and (max-width:767px) {
  .row-fluid .span4,
  .row-fluid .span8 {
    <vb:comment>/* Stretch all columns to full width*/</vb:comment>
    width: 100%;
    <vb:comment>/* Stack vertically */</vb:comment>
    display: block;
  }

<vb:comment>
  /* Override extra long rules that put padding to either side of a column
   * when there are multiple columns. At this point everything should stack. */

  /**
   * Remove paddings that previously were used for gutters between columns.
   */
</vb:comment>
  .canvas-layout-container .canvas-layout .canvas-widget-list.has-adjacent-right-col {
    padding-{vb:stylevar right}: 0;
    margin-{vb:stylevar right}: 0;
  }

  .canvas-layout-container .canvas-layout .canvas-widget-list.has-adjacent-left-col {
    padding-{vb:stylevar left}: 0;
    margin-{vb:stylevar left}: 0;
  }
}


<vb:comment>
/* ==========================================================================
   Header
   ========================================================================== */
</vb:comment>

html.touch .edit-switch-container { display: none; }
html.touch #main-navbar .main-nav { display: none; }

@media only screen and (max-width:767px) {

  #header .site-logo {padding-{vb:stylevar left}: 20px;}

  <vb:comment>/* Bring this under 320px or you get side-scrolling on iPhone portrait mode. */</vb:comment>
  #header .header-cell {min-width:300px;}

  #header .search-container {display: none;}
  
}

@media only screen and (max-width:480px) {
  #vb-page-body .main-header,
  .content-entry-box .content-entry-box-header,
  .view-mode .canvas-layout-container .canvas-widget.profile-settings-widget .widget-header .module-title {
    <vb:comment>/* Reduce the font size at narrower screen width */</vb:comment>
    font-size: 24px;
    line-height: 24px;
    padding: 5px 0 10px;
  }
  #header .site-logo {
    padding-{vb:stylevar left}: 10px;
  }
}

@media only screen and (max-width:320px) {

  #vb-page-body .main-header,
  .content-entry-box .content-entry-box-header,
  .view-mode .canvas-layout-container .canvas-widget.profile-settings-widget .widget-header .module-title {
    font-size: 20px;
    line-height: 20px;
  }

  #header .site-logo {padding-{vb:stylevar left}: 10px;}
}


<vb:comment>
/* ==========================================================================
   Header Logo
   ========================================================================== */

/**
* In a change from the way we've been doing responsive, for the logo image,
* we're going to try to constrain its _height_, based on the height of
* the viewport. */

#header .site-logo img {
  /* Let's just cap the max logo image height in all cases. */
  /* max-height: 100px; */
}
</vb:comment>

@media only screen and (max-height: 480px) {
  <vb:comment>/* iPhone portrait mode */</vb:comment>
  #header .site-logo img {
    max-height: 40px;
    width: auto;
  }
  <vb:comment>/* Let's also reduce the padding of the enclosing container */</vb:comment>
  #header .site-logo {
    padding-top: 14px;
    padding-bottom: 16px;
  }
}

@media only screen and (max-height: 320px) {
  <vb:comment>
  /* iPhone landscape mode (shorter than portrait mode, of course) */
  </vb:comment>
  #header .site-logo img {
    max-height: 32px;
    width: auto;
  }
  <vb:comment>
  /* Reduce the padding of the enclosing container even further */
  </vb:comment>
  #header .site-logo {
    padding-top: 10px;
    padding-bottom: 12px;
  }

}



<vb:comment>
/* ==========================================================================
   Admin features
   ========================================================================== */

   /* 
		Hide admin features after margin collapse 
		Set to higher breakpoint b/c of the amount of items in the limited horizontal space
		These items may have move (in the DOM). It doesn't look like a subpath from
		#header will work as a selector
   */
</vb:comment>
	@media only screen and (max-width:1000px) {

		#main-navbar .main-nav li,#sitebuilder-wrapper{display:none;}
		#main-navbar .main-nav li.lnkAdminCP{display:inline-block;}
	}
	
	@media only screen and (max-width:767px) {
		#main-navbar .main-nav li.lnkAdminCP,
		.edit-switch-container{display:none;}
	}

<vb:comment>
	/*
		@media only screen and (max-width:767px) {
			#main-navbar .edit-switch-container,
			#header .edit-switch-container,
			#sitebuilder-wrapper {display: none !important;}
		}
	*/
</vb:comment>


<vb:comment>
/* ==========================================================================
   Notices
   ========================================================================== */
</vb:comment>

@media only screen and (max-width:767px) {
  <vb:comment>/* Create space between top of notices and navigation */</vb:comment>
  .notices {
    margin: 10px 20px;
  }
}

@media only screen and (max-width:480px) {
  <vb:comment>/* Adjust the left and right margins of notices */</vb:comment>
  .notices {
    margin: 10px;
  }
}


<vb:comment>
/* ==========================================================================
   Action buttons
   ========================================================================== */
</vb:comment>

@media only screen and (max-width:480px) {

<vb:comment>/* Buttons should align to the right of their container*/</vb:comment>
.action-buttons .right,
.action-buttons.right 
{
  float:{vb:stylevar right};
  clear: none;
  width: 100%;
}

.action-buttons .right .button,
.action-buttons.right .button {
  <vb:comment>
  /**
   * When the buttons lay out horizontally, reverse their order so they
   * run right to left (per the design)
   */
  </vb:comment>
  float:{vb:stylevar right};
  display: block;
  <vb:comment>
  /**
   * Set up margins so there is adequate spacing between buttons even
   * if they happen to break to another line.
   */
  </vb:comment>
  margin-{vb:stylevar left}: 10px;
  margin-bottom: 10px;
}

<vb:comment>
  /**
   * At 480px and below the buttons no longer float to the right.
   */
</vb:comment>
  .action-buttons .right,
  .action-buttons.right {
    float: none;
    padding-top: 10px;
    clear: both;
  }

<vb:comment>
  /**
   * Stack buttons vertically, into a more iPhone-like orientation.
   */
</vb:comment>
  .action-buttons .right button,
  .action-buttons.right button,
  .action-buttons .see-all-btn,
  .profile-sidebar-widget.canvas-widget .profile-menulist .profile-action-buttons a.button,
  .profile-sidebar-widget.canvas-widget .profile-menulist .profile-action-buttons button {
    <vb:comment>/* Stack */</vb:comment>
    display: block;
    float: none;
    <vb:comment>/* Create spacing below each button */</vb:comment>
    margin-bottom: 10px;
    margin-{vb:stylevar left}: 0;
    margin-{vb:stylevar right}: 0;
    <vb:comment>/* Extend to full available width */</vb:comment>
    width: 100%;
    <vb:comment>/* Make the buttons taller to match their increased width */</vb:comment>
    padding-top: 10px;
    padding-bottom: 10px;
    <vb:comment>/* Stop setting fixed heights on things. Seriously. */</vb:comment>
    height: auto;
    <vb:comment>/* Bump up the font size slightly */</vb:comment>
    font-size: 1.2em !important;
  }
  
<vb:comment>
  /** If 'Customize My Theme' button is hidden, don't display it (the above rule does). 
  * We could have used :not selector there and avoid this extra rule but not sure of the mobile browser support of it 
  */
</vb:comment>
  .profile-sidebar-widget.canvas-widget .profile-menulist .profile-action-buttons button.hide {
  	display:none;
  }

  .action-buttons .see-all-btn {
    width: 85% !important;
    margin: 0 auto;
  }


<vb:comment>
  /**
   * This may be somewhat controversial, but in the full app the buttons
   * are being set with fixed heights and repeating gradient backgrounds.
   * It's more flexible to allow their heights to adjust and utilize a
   * gradient background.
   *
   * This is a good Photoshop-like interface for generating all of the
   * variants: http://www.colorzilla.com/gradient-editor/
   */
</vb:comment>
  .button.primary {
    /* Blue to darker blue gradient */
    background: #37ACFE;
    background: -moz-linear-gradient(top, #37ACFE 0%,{vb:stylevar button_primary_border.color} 100%);
    background: -webkit-gradient(linear, left top, left bottom, color-stop(0%,#37ACFE), color-stop(100%,{vb:stylevar button_primary_border.color}));
    background: -webkit-linear-gradient(top, #37ACFE 0%,{vb:stylevar button_primary_border.color} 100%);
    background: -o-linear-gradient(top, #37ACFE 0%,{vb:stylevar button_primary_border.color} 100%);
    background: -ms-linear-gradient(top, #37ACFE 0%,{vb:stylevar button_primary_border.color} 100%);
    background: linear-gradient(to bottom, #37ACFE 0%,{vb:stylevar button_primary_border.color} 100%);
    filter: progid:DXImageTransform.Microsoft.gradient( startColorstr='#37ACFE', endColorstr='{vb:stylevar button_primary_border.color}',GradientType=0 );
  }

  .button.secondary {
    /* White to light gray gradient */
    background: #E3E7E8;
    background: -moz-linear-gradient(top, #FFFFFF 0%, #E3E7E8 100%) !important;
    background: -webkit-gradient(linear, left top, left bottom, color-stop(0%,#FFFFFF), color-stop(100%,#E3E7E8)) !imporant;
    background: -webkit-linear-gradient(top, #FFFFFF 0%,#E3E7E8 100%) !important;
    background: -o-linear-gradient(top, #FFFFFF 0%,#E3E7E8 100%);
    background: -ms-linear-gradient(top, #FFFFFF 0%,#E3E7E8 100%) !important;
    background: linear-gradient(to bottom, #FFFFFF 0%,#E3E7E8 100%);
    filter: progid:DXImageTransform.Microsoft.gradient( startColorstr='#FFFFFF', endColorstr='#E3E7E8',GradientType=0 );
  }

  .private-message-widget .button.light {
    /* Lighter blue gradient */
    background: #ACD5E4;
    background: -moz-linear-gradient(top, #FFFFFF 0%, #EDF9FF 1%, #ACD5E4 100%);
    background: -webkit-gradient(linear, left top, left bottom, color-stop(0%,#FFFFFF), color-stop(1%,#EDF9FF), color-stop(100%,#ACD5E4));
    background: -webkit-linear-gradient(top, #FFFFFF 0%,#EDF9FF 1%,#ACD5E4 100%);
    background: -o-linear-gradient(top, #FFFFFF 0%,#EDF9FF 1%,#ACD5E4 100%);
    background: -ms-linear-gradient(top, #FFFFFF 0%,#EDF9FF 1%,#ACD5E4 100%);
    background: linear-gradient(to bottom, #FFFFFF 0%,#EDF9FF 1%,#ACD5E4 100%);
    filter: progid:DXImageTransform.Microsoft.gradient( startColorstr='#FFFFFF', endColorstr='#ACD5E4',GradientType=0 );
    color: {vb:stylevar button_special_text_color};
    padding-top: 10px;
    padding-bottom: 10px;
    font-size: 14px;
  }
}


<vb:comment>
/* ==========================================================================
   Activity tabs
   ========================================================================== */
/**
* Tricky little bit here. We secretly replace the text of the phrase
* "Forum Directory" with the shorter "Forums" at strategic breakpoints,
* allowing us to not switch to the dropdown menu until less than 
* iPhone landscape dimensions.
*/
</vb:comment>

.widget-header .default-text { display: block; }
.widget-header .responsive-text { display: none; }

<vb:comment>
/**
* Fix arrow alignment for all the buttons appearing in the
* headers (Blogs, Forum, Social Groups, Special)
*/
</vb:comment>
.forum-list-container .category-header .toggle-subforums-btn span {
  height: 12px !important;
}

@media only screen and (min-width:767px) and (max-width:820px) {
  .widget-header .default-text { display: none; }
  .widget-header .responsive-text { display: block; }
}

@media only screen and (min-width:479px) and (max-width:520px) {
  .widget-header .default-text { display: none; }
  .widget-header .responsive-text { display: block; }
}



<vb:comment>
/* ==========================================================================
   Filter bar
   ========================================================================== */


/* Search bar on Forum Topic page
   ========================================================================== */

/**
* Shrink the container and input boxes at various sizes.
*/
</vb:comment>
@media only screen and (max-width:767px) {
  .conversation-toolbar-wrapper .conversation-toolbar .toolbar-search .search-container { width: 120px; }
  .conversation-toolbar-wrapper .conversation-toolbar .toolbar-search .search-container input[type="text"] { width: 82px; }
}

@media only screen and (max-width:480px) {
  .conversation-toolbar-wrapper .conversation-toolbar .toolbar-search .search-container { width: 88px; }
  .conversation-toolbar-wrapper .conversation-toolbar .toolbar-search .search-container input[type="text"] { width: 50px; }
}


<vb:comment>
/* Selected filters bar on Forum Topic page
   ========================================================================== */

</vb:comment>
@media only screen and (max-width:767px) {
  /* Selected Filters bar */
  .conversation-toolbar-wrapper .filtered-by {
    /* Full-sized version was height set to 18px, so make that the min-height */
    min-height: 18px;
    /* Let it set its own normal height */
    height: auto;
    /* Make a few adjustments to make it look right */
    padding: 3px 10px;
    line-height: 20px;
  }

<vb:comment>
  /**
   * Make sure the words "Clear All" break together to the next line
   * if necessary.
   */
</vb:comment>
  .filtered-by .clear-all { display: inline-block; }
}



@media only screen and (max-width:480px) {
  /* Remove moderation toolbar components at mobile sizes */
  .toolbar-inline-mod { display: none; }
  .pagenav.left .textbox { padding: 3px; }

<vb:comment>
/* Responsive Filter menu
   ========================================================================== 
   *
   * This is a first attempt to make a palatable responsive filter
   * menu at smaller sizes. We change the vertical columns to
   * horizontal rows and let the options simply run inline. */
</vb:comment>
  .conversation-toolbar-wrapper .toolbar-filter-overlay { padding: 0; }

  .conversation-toolbar-wrapper .toolbar-filter-overlay .filter-options-list > li {
    display: block;
    padding: 10px;
    border-{vb:stylevar left}: none;
    border-top: 1px dotted {vb:stylevar toolbar_dropdown_divider_color};
  }

  .conversation-toolbar-wrapper .toolbar-filter-overlay .filter-options-list > li:first-child { border-top: none; }

  .conversation-toolbar-wrapper .toolbar-filter-overlay .filter-options-list > li .left { float: none; }

  .conversation-toolbar-wrapper .toolbar-filter-overlay .filter-options-list > li label {
    display: inline-block;
    margin-{vb:stylevar right}: 1em;
  }

}

@media only screen and (max-width:320px) {
  <vb:comment>
  /* At minimum width, hide the word "Filter" in the Filter menu, leaving
   * only the arrow (correcting padding to look right).
   *
   * NOTE: We're using an adjacent sibling selector so that we only collaps
   * the word if it has the page nav next to it. On the home page, for example,
   * there is nothing else on the filter bar line, so we should show the 
   * full label. */
  </vb:comment>
  .conversation-toolbar-wrapper .conversation-toolbar .toolbar-pagenav+.toolbar-filter .filter-wrapper {  padding-{vb:stylevar left}: 4px; }

  .conversation-toolbar-wrapper .conversation-toolbar .toolbar-pagenav+.toolbar-filter .filter-wrapper .label.left { display: none; }
}



<vb:comment>
/* ==========================================================================
   Forum Subscribe and Share buttons
   ========================================================================== */
</vb:comment>

@media only screen and (max-width:480px) {
  <vb:comment>
   /* When browser narrows to iPad landscape mode, shift the buttons
   * to the left and space them appropriately beneath the forum title. */
  </vb:comment>
  .channel-content-widget .channel-controls.right,
  .conversation-controls.right {
    float: none;
    margin-top: 8px;
    <vb:comment>
    /* Perhaps because of a float, but there isn't actually 20px
     * of space under the buttons. We're merely increasing spacing
     * by 4px from the original 16px */
    </vb:comment>
    padding-bottom: 20px;
  }

  <vb:comment>/* Make the first button flush left. */</vb:comment>
  .channel-controls.right button:first-child,
  .conversation-controls.right button:first-child {
    margin-{vb:stylevar left}: 0;
  }
}



<vb:comment>
/* ==========================================================================
   Forum Directory tab
   ========================================================================== */
</vb:comment>

@media only screen and (max-width:768px) {
  <vb:comment>
  /**
   * The full-size code doesn't handle breaking text very well. If the
   * name of the forum wraps, it falls under the icon, which isn't desirable.
   * So we're going to take the original margin applied to .forum-desc (below)
   * and apply it to the whole table cell.
   * (continued below)
   */
  </vb:comment>
  .forum-list-container .forum-item td:first-child {
    padding-{vb:stylevar left}: 25px;
    position: relative;
  }

  <vb:comment>
  /* (continued from above)
   * We then position the icon in the padded area.
   * (continued below)
   */
  </vb:comment>
  .forum-list-container .forum-item.subforum-item .cell-forum .icon {
    position: absolute;
    {vb:stylevar left}: 5px;
  }

  <vb:comment>
  /* (continued from above)
   * And remove the margin from forum desc.
   */
  </vb:comment>
  .forum-list-container .forum-item .cell-forum .forum-desc {
    margin-{vb:stylevar left}: 0px;
  }


}

@media only screen and (max-width:480px) {

  <vb:comment>
  /**
   * Hide the Latest Post column
   */
  </vb:comment>
  .forum-list-container .forum-list-header .header-lastpost,
  .forum-list-container .forum-item .lastpost {
    display: none;
  }
  
  <vb:comment>
  /* Add border to the right of the Posts column which is now the last column as a result of hiding the Latest Post column */
  </vb:comment>
  .forum-list-container .forum-list-header .header-posts {
  	border-{vb:stylevar right}:{vb:stylevar primary_module_subheader_border};
  }

  <vb:comment>
  /* We don't want the view count to wrap, better to have it
   * break to the next line all together */
  </vb:comment>
  .forum-list-container .viewer {
    white-space: nowrap;
  }

}


<vb:comment>
/* ==========================================================================
   Forum Topic
   ========================================================================== */
</vb:comment>

@media only screen and (max-width:767px) {
  .list-container .list-item .list-item-body { padding: 10px; }
  #thread-view-tab .post-footer .content-tags { margin-{vb:stylevar left}: 10px; }

<vb:comment>
  .conversation-list.stream-view .list-item-header {
    /* padding-top: 15px; */
  }
</vb:comment>

}

@media only screen and (max-width:480px) {
  <vb:comment>/* Stack the thread view conversation components */</vb:comment>
  .conversation-content-widget .list-container.thread-view .list-item .userinfo {
    width: 100%;
    float: none;
    display: block;
    text-align:{vb:stylevar left};
    padding: 10px 10px 16px;
    -webkit-box-sizing: border-box;
    -moz-box-sizing: border-box;
    box-sizing: border-box;
  }

<vb:comment>
  /* Put a clearfix in only when we get down to this width */
  /* http://nicolasgallagher.com/micro-clearfix-hack/ */
</vb:comment>
  .conversation-content-widget .list-container.thread-view .list-item .userinfo:before,
  .conversation-content-widget .list-container.thread-view .list-item .userinfo:after {
    content: " "; 
    display: table;
  }

  .conversation-content-widget .list-container.thread-view .list-item .userinfo:after {
    clear: both;
  }

<vb:comment>
  /**
  * For IE 6/7 only: Include this rule to trigger hasLayout and contain floats.
  */
</vb:comment>
  .conversation-content-widget .list-container.thread-view .list-item .userinfo {
    *zoom: 1;
  }


  .conversation-content-widget .list-container.thread-view .list-item .list-item-body-wrapper {
    width: 100%;
    float: none;
    display: block;
    margin: 0;
  }

  .conversation-content-widget .conversation-comments-wrapper {
    margin: 0;
    padding: 0;
  }

<vb:comment>
  /**
   * Reposition the pointer from the left side to the top of the
   * container, rotating it in the process.
   */
</vb:comment>
  .conversation-content-widget .list-item-body-wrapper .pointer-left {
    <vb:comment>/* Move above and outside the text block */</vb:comment>
    top: -10px;
    <vb:comment>/* Position centered under the avatar */</vb:comment>
    {vb:stylevar left}: 39px;
    -webkit-transform: rotate(90deg);
    -moz-transform: rotate(90deg);
    transform: rotate(90deg);
  }

  .conversation-content-widget .thread-view .post-footer-wrapper .post-footer .divider,
  .conversation-content-widget .post-footer-wrapper .post-footer .divider {
    margin: 0;
  }

  <vb:comment>/* Remove moderation checkbox */</vb:comment>
  .thread-view .inlinemod-item .checkbox { display: none; }


<vb:comment>
  /**
   * In general, we are trying to collapse the elements of .userinfo into a
   * single line where possible, breaking onto a second line where necessary.
   */
</vb:comment>

  .conversation-content-widget .list-container.thread-view .list-item .userinfo .avatar {
    float:{vb:stylevar left};
    margin-{vb:stylevar right}: 10px;
  }

  .userinfo-details {
    float:{vb:stylevar left};
  }

  .conversation-content-widget .list-container.thread-view .list-item .userinfo .author {
    margin-top: 0;
    margin-{vb:stylevar right}: 10px;
    word-wrap: break-word;
  }

  .userinfo .reputation {
    margin-{vb:stylevar right}: 10px;
    padding-{vb:stylevar left}: 0;
  }

  .conversation-content-widget .list-container.thread-view .list-item .list-item-body-wrapper .list-item-body {
    padding-top: 10px;
    padding-{vb:stylevar left}: 10px;
    padding-{vb:stylevar right}: 10px;
  }

  .userinfo .userinfo-extra { margin-top: 5px; display: block; width: 100%;}

  .userinfo .userinfo-extra li {
    display: inline-block;
    margin-{vb:stylevar right}: 10px;
  }

  .conversation-comments .list-item-header .author,
  .conversation-comments .list-item-header .post-date {
    margin-{vb:stylevar left}: 10px;
  }

<vb:comment>
  /**
   * Having these items position themselves like TDs with content vertically
   * aligned in the center and no padding whatsoever creates problems when the
   * content breaks to a second line -- that element's text will butt up
   * against the top edge of the container. Here we're merely adding a little
   * breathing room to ensure against that.
   */
</vb:comment>
  .conversation-list.stream-view .list-item-header .info,
  .conversation-content-widget .conversation-list.stream-view .list-item-header .post-header.table .post-action-wrapper.td {
    padding-top: 5px;
  }

  .post-footer-wrapper .post-footer .post-controls {
    margin-{vb:stylevar right}: 10px;
    margin-{vb:stylevar left}: 10px;
  }


  .conversation-list.stream-view .list-item-header .post-header {
    width: 100%;
    float: none;
  }

  .conversation-list.stream-view .list-item-header .post-header .post-action-wrapper {
    width: auto;
  }

  .post-header .channel-info {
    display: inline;
    display: inline-block;
  }

  .conversation-list.stream-view .list-item-header .right {
    width: 100%;
    clear: both;
    display: block;
    height: auto;
    line-height: 1em;
    padding: 0 0 15px 0;
    margin-{vb:stylevar left}: 10px;
  }

  .conversation-list.stream-view .list-item-header .info .post-date {
    float:{vb:stylevar left};
    margin-{vb:stylevar left}: 45px;
  }

  .conversation-list.stream-view .list-item-header .info .subscribed  {
    clear: none;
    display: inline-block;
  }

  .conversation-list.stream-view .list-item-header .post-header.table {
    height: auto;
  }
}

@media only screen and (max-width:320px) {
  .userinfo-extra{clear:{vb:stylevar left};}
  .post-footer-wrapper .post-footer ul li{margin-{vb:stylevar left}:6px;}
}


<vb:comment>
/* ==========================================================================
   New Topic form
   ========================================================================== */

/* General-purpose rules that prevent the file upload
* button and text from displaying if Modernizr detects that
* the browser doesn't support input[type=file] */
</vb:comment>

span.button.custom-upload-button,
.allowed-filetypes {
  display: none;
}

html.fileinput span.button.custom-upload-button,
html.fileinput .allowed-filetypes {
  display: inline;
  display: inline-block;
}


@media only screen and (max-width:767px) {
  <vb:comment>
  /**
   * Sneaky attempt to hide the word "Editor" in "Advanced Editor"
   *
   * We set a width in ems (which theoretically should work if user resizes
   * their fonts), and then clip any overflow, hoping that only the word
   * "Advanced" remains.
   */
  </vb:comment>
  .editor-tab {
    width: 6.8em;
    overflow-x: hidden;
  }

  .content-entry-box .content-entry-box-tabs .content-entry-box-tab,
  .underline-tabs-container .underline-tabs .underline-tab {
    margin-{vb:stylevar left}: 3px;
	overflow:hidden;
  }
}

@media only screen and (max-width:480px) {
  body .button.photo-selector-button {
    margin-{vb:stylevar left}: 0;
    margin-top: 10px;
  }
  .content-entry-box form {
    <vb:comment>/* Reduce padding to accommodate narrower screen */</vb:comment>
    padding: 10px 10px 20px;
    display: block;
  }

  .content-entry-box .entry-field {
    <vb:comment>
    /* Switch box model to allow entry fields to fit properly in
     * their container. */
    </vb:comment>
    -webkit-box-sizing: border-box;
    -moz-box-sizing: border-box;
    box-sizing: border-box;
    width: 100%;
    <vb:comment>/* Let the poor div be its natural height. */</vb:comment>
    height: auto !important;
  }
}

<vb:comment>
/* moved to 767 from 479 - too many elements in horizontal space */
</vb:comment>
@media only screen and (max-width:767px) {
  
  .editor-tab { width: auto; }

  .content-entry-box-tab.ui-tabs-selected .label{display:inline;}
 
}

@media only screen and (max-width:479px) {

.select-label {

@media only screen and (max-width:767px) {

    margin-{vb:stylevar left}: 0;

  }

@media only screen and (max-width:479px) {
  .blogAdminLeft,
  .blogAdminRight {
    -webkit-box-sizing: border-box;
    -moz-box-sizing: border-box;
    box-sizing: border-box;
    float: none;
    width: 100%;
  }

  .blogAdminLeft li { padding: 0;  display: none; }
  .blogAdminLeft ul.expanded li { display: block; }
  .blogAdminLeft ul.expanded li a,
  .blogAdminLeft li.blogAdminActive {
    display: block;
    padding: 12px;

    background: {vb:stylevar side_nav_background};
  }

  .blogAdminLeft li.blogAdminActive:hover {

    cursor: pointer;
  }

<vb:comment>
  /* Display a down arrow on the right side of the button.
   *
   * NOTE: The path to this image may need to change upon integrating
   * this CSS file into the main application. */
</vb:comment>
  .blogAdminActive:after {
    content: '';
    float:{vb:stylevar right};
    width: 20px;
    height: 20px;
    background: url(images/css/sprite_icons_vb.png) 8px -40px no-repeat;
  }
  .blogAdminLeft ul.expanded .blogAdminActive {
    background: #BBE;
  }
  .blogAdminLeft ul.expanded .blogAdminActive:hover {
    background: #B0B0E0;
  }
  .blogAdminLeft ul.expanded .blogAdminActive:after {
    background-position: -8px -40px;
  }
}

<vb:comment>

.avatar.left > img {
  vertical-align: inherit;

@media only screen and (max-width:767px) {

<vb:comment>
  /* Begin Private Message thread stacking.
   *
   * Replicate the rules for the conversation widget, but limit
   * them to the private message widget (since we start it at a higher
   * viewport width. */
</vb:comment>
  .private-message-widget-layout .conversation-content-widget .list-container.thread-view .list-item .userinfo { width: 100%; float: none; display: block; text-align:{vb:stylevar left};padding: 10px 10px 16px; -webkit-box-sizing: border-box; -moz-box-sizing: border-box; box-sizing: border-box; }
  .private-message-widget-layout .conversation-content-widget .list-container.thread-view .list-item .userinfo:before,
  .private-message-widget-layout .conversation-content-widget .list-container.thread-view .list-item .userinfo:after {
    content: " "; 
    display: table;
  }
  .private-message-widget-layout .conversation-content-widget .list-container.thread-view .list-item .userinfo:after {
    clear: both;
  }
  .private-message-widget-layout .conversation-content-widget .list-container.thread-view .list-item .userinfo {
    *zoom: 1;
  }
  .private-message-widget-layout .conversation-content-widget .list-container.thread-view .list-item .list-item-body-wrapper {
    width: 100%; float: none; display: block; margin: 0; }
  .private-message-widget-layout .conversation-content-widget .conversation-comments-wrapper { margin: 0; padding: 0; }
  .private-message-widget-layout .conversation-content-widget .list-item-body-wrapper .pointer-left { top: -10px; {vb:stylevar left}: 39px; -webkit-transform: rotate(90deg); -moz-transform: rotate(90deg); transform: rotate(90deg); }
  .private-message-widget-layout .conversation-content-widget .thread-view .post-footer-wrapper .post-footer .divider,
  .private-message-widget-layout .conversation-content-widget .post-footer-wrapper .post-footer .divider { margin: 0; }

  .private-message-widget-layout .conversation-content-widget .list-container.thread-view .list-item .userinfo .avatar {
    float:{vb:stylevar left};
    margin-{vb:stylevar right}: 10px;
  }

  .private-message-widget-layout .userinfo-details {
    float:{vb:stylevar left};
  }

  .private-message-widget-layout .conversation-content-widget .list-container.thread-view .list-item .userinfo .author {
    margin-top:0;
    margin-{vb:stylevar right}:10px;
    word-wrap: break-word;
  }

  .private-message-widget-layout .userinfo .reputation {
    margin-{vb:stylevar right}: 10px;
    padding-{vb:stylevar left}: 0;
  }
  <vb:comment>
/* End Private Message thread stacking */
  </vb:comment>

}


@media only screen and (max-width:479px) {

  .section-1 .private-message-widget.empty { display: none; }

  .private-message-widget .main-pane h2.main-pane-header { margin-top: 20px; }


  .private-message-widget.conversation-content-widget .conversation-content {
    padding: 0;
  }

    margin: 15px 0;

  #canvas-layout-70-30 .section-0 #privateMessageContainer .content-entry-box .entry-field,

  .private-message-widget .widget-content .content-entry-box.msg-type-new,

  }

<vb:comment>

</vb:comment>

  }

  }

  .private-message-widget.conversation-content-widget .conversation-content {

  }

<vb:comment>

   Private Message Toolbars
   ========================================================================== */
</vb:comment>

@media only screen and (max-width:676px) {

  #pmFloatingBarContent .button + .split-button {
    min-width:0;
    margin-{vb:stylevar left}: 4px;
  }

  .private-message-toolbar .toolset button {
    min-width:0;

    margin-{vb:stylevar left}: 4px;
  }

  .private-message-toolbar .split-button .split-button-wrapper .button-set .button-text {
    min-width:0;
    padding-{vb:stylevar left}: 5px;

  .private-message-widget .split-button .split-button-wrapper {

  }

  }

  #pmBtnNotificationDelete {min-width:0;}

  #pmBtnDelete .icon,
  #pmBtnNotificationDelete .icon {display: inline-block; margin-{vb:stylevar right}:0;}

  #pmBtnDelete .phrase,
  #pmBtnNotificationDelete .phrase {display: none;}
}

@media only screen and (max-width:680px) {
  #btnMove,
  body button.pmBtnUndelete,

     min-width:0;
     width: auto;
   }
  #btnMove .icon { display: inline-block; }
  #btnMove .phrase { display: none; }
  #notificationPageto { padding-{vb:stylevar left}: 3px; padding-{vb:stylevar right}: 3px; width: 16px; }
  #privatemessagePaging { padding-{vb:stylevar right}: 2px; padding-{vb:stylevar left}: 5px; }
}

@media only screen and (max-width:640px) {

  #pmBtnMarkUnRead { min-width:0; }

@media only screen and (max-width:600px) {
  .private-message-widget button,
  #privateMessageContainer .private-message-widget button {
    padding-{vb:stylevar left}: 5px;
    padding-{vb:stylevar right}: 5px;

  }


  #pmFloatingBarContent .button + .split-button,
  #privateMessageContainer .button + .split-button {
    margin-{vb:stylevar left}: 3px;
  }
  .split-button .split-button-wrapper .button-set .button-icon.ui-button-icon-only {

    width: 16px;
  }

  }

  .view-mode .canvas-layout-container .private-message-widget.private-message-toolbar {
    -webkit-border-top-{vb:stylevar left}-radius: 3px;
    -moz-border-radius-top{vb:stylevar left}: 3px;

  }

  .split-button.left {
    height: 25px;
  }

}

#privateMessageContainer .toolset.left {
  padding: 5px;
  padding-{vb:stylevar right}: 10px;
  padding-{vb:stylevar left}: 6px;
  display: none;
  background: {vb:stylevar side_nav_background};
  border-bottom: {vb:stylevar side_nav_border};
}

@media only screen and (max-width:599px) {
  #privateMessageContainer .toolset.left {
    -moz-box-sizing: border-box;
    -webkit-box-sizing: border-box;

    display: block;

  }

  }

  }

<vb:comment>responsive:css - media queries:profile page</vb:comment>

<vb:comment>
/* desktop view */
/* private message button - cloned and relocated */
</vb:comment>
.profile_sidebar_content > .profileContainer > div.pm-button-container{display:none;}
<vb:comment>
/* Profile: Hide Customize Theme button for touchscreens. */
</vb:comment>
html.touch .button.primary.customize-theme { display: none !important; }


@media only screen and (max-width:767px) {
	
	<vb:comment>
	/* remove border from container: each of the four tabs */
	</vb:comment>
	#profileTab,#accountTab,#notificationsTab,#privacyTab{border:0;}
	
	<vb:comment>
	/* set left margin for whole container */
	</vb:comment>
	.prof_usersettings_container{margin-{vb:stylevar left}:5px !important;}

<vb:comment>
	/* add top margin between list items */
</vb:comment>
	.prof_usersettings_container .prof_usersetting_row .settings_left{margin-top:20px;}
	
	<vb:comment>
	/* reduce top margin between item and its associated description */
	</vb:comment>
	.prof_usersettings_container .prof_usersetting_row .settings_right p.setting_desc{margin-top:5px;}

<vb:comment>
	/* line labels up with form fields: adjust for border */
</vb:comment>
	.prof_usersettings_container .prof_usersetting_row .settings_left label{margin-{vb:stylevar left}:2px;}
	
	<vb:comment>
	/* position remove-screen-name icon */
	</vb:comment>
	.prof_usersetting_row .settings_right .im_wrapper .remove-screen-name {
		float:{vb:stylevar left} !important;
		width:20px;
		margin-top:8px !important;
	}
	
	<vb:comment>
	/* position new screen name text */
	</vb:comment>
	.prof_usersetting_row .settings_right .setting_desc .new_screename {white-space:nowrap;margin-{vb:stylevar left}:5px !important;position:absolute;{vb:stylevar left}:150px;}
	
	<vb:comment>
	/* labels - left column */
	/*.prof_usersetting_row div*/
	</vb:comment>
	.prof_usersetting_row div.settings_left,
	.prof_usersetting_row div.settings_right
	{float:none !important;display:block !important;padding:0 !important;}
	.prof_usersetting_row div label{white-space:nowrap;}
	
	<vb:comment>
	/* im-screen-name row */
	</vb:comment>
	.prof_usersetting_row .settings_right.im-screen-name{float:{vb:stylevar left};}
	.prof_usersetting_row .settings_right.im-screen-name div a.selectBox{margin:5px 0 15px 0 !important;}
	.prof_usersetting_row .settings_right.im-screen-name div select{margin-top:5px !important;margin-bottom:5px !important;margin-{vb:stylevar left}:0px !important;}
	
	<vb:comment>
	/* set max-width from form fields */
	</vb:comment>
	.prof_usersettings_container .prof_usersetting_row .settings_right input,
	.prof_usersettings_container .prof_usersetting_row .settings_right textarea,
	.prof_usersetting_row .settings_right.im-screen-name{max-width:275px;}
	
	<vb:comment>
	/* reduce size of IM name text box */
	</vb:comment>
	.prof_usersettings_container .prof_usersetting_row .settings_right .user_screenname {width:125px !important;}

<vb:comment>
	/* profile settings: account tab */
</vb:comment>
	div.ui-dialog.ui-widget.ui-widget-content.ui-corner-all.dialog-container.input-dialog.ui-draggable{width:95% !important;{vb:stylevar left}:10px !important;}
	div.ui-dialog.ui-widget.ui-widget-content.ui-corner-all.ui-draggable.dialog-container.confirm-dialog-container.dialog-box{width:95% !important;}
	
	<vb:comment>
	/* profile settings: privacy and notifications - allow text break on spaces */
	</vb:comment>
	#privacyTab .prof_usersetting_row .settings_right label,
	#notificationsTab .prof_usersetting_row .settings_right .suboption label
	{white-space:normal !important;}
	
	<vb:comment>
	/* profile tabs menu */
	</vb:comment>
	.profile-settings-widget .settingsTabs ul li,
	.profile-settings-widget .settingsTabs ul li a
	{color:#000;background-position:-0px -100px !important;line-height:28px;height:28px;width: 100%;margin-{vb:stylevar left}:0px !important;}
	
	<vb:comment>
	/* edit profile picture - modal */
	</vb:comment>
	div.edit-profile-photo-dialog-container,
	div.profile-media-upload-dialog{width:95% !important;}

	img.profile-photo{vertical-align:baseline;}
	
	<vb:comment>
	/* remove top set of action buttons */
	/*#profileSettings_form:first-child{display:none;}*/
	/* #profileSettings_form,#accountSettings_form,notificationSettings_form,privacySettings_form */
	</vb:comment>
	.action-buttons.right.top{display:none;}
	
	<vb:comment>
	/* fix status textarea - reducing size of padding on this element */
	</vb:comment>
	.section.about-status .section-content textarea{padding:5px;}
	
	<vb:comment>
	/* remove excessive padding for mobile display */
	</vb:comment>
	.section .section-content.table .tr .td{padding: 10px 5px !important;}
	.section .section-header{padding-{vb:stylevar left}:5px;}
	
	<vb:comment>
	/* private message button - cloned and relocated */
	</vb:comment>
	.conversation-toolbar > ul > li > a.pm_button{display:none;}
	.profile_sidebar_content > .profileContainer > div.pm-button-container {display:block}

}

@media only screen and (max-width:479px) {

<vb:comment>
	/* reduce font size for time zone select box - select for safari, anchor for other browsers */
</vb:comment>
	.prof_usersetting_row .settings_right select.user_tzo.timezone_dropDown,
	.prof_usersetting_row .settings_right a.user_tzo.timezone_dropDown{font-size:.75em;}
	
	<vb:comment>

<vb:comment>
/* profile edit settings form: "save changes" and "reset fields" buttons */
</vb:comment>
@media only screen and (max-width:767px) {

<vb:comment>
/* remove filter elements */
</vb:comment>
@media only screen and (max-width:767px) {

<vb:comment>
	/* hide "Back to profile" button, showing n subscriptions text */
	/*.button.secondary.back-button,.subscriptions-totalcount{display:none;}*/
	
	/* removes background image (vertical bar) from filter */

	.toolbar-wrapper .horizontal-toolbar .toolset.right > li {background:none;}

}

<vb:comment>
/* profile: subscriptions,subscribers */
/* by default, hide facade and display existing elements */ 
</vb:comment>

#subscriptionsTab .conversation-toolbar.rx-desktop .toolset-left{display:block;}
#subscriptionsTab .conversation-toolbar.rx-facade-back-to-profile,
#subscriptionsTab .conversation-toolbar.rx-facade-subscription-count{display:none;}
#subscribersTab .conversation-toolbar.rx-desktop .toolset-left{display:block;}
#subscribersTab .conversation-toolbar.rx-facade-back-to-profile,
#subscribersTab .conversation-toolbar.rx-facade-subscriber-count{display:none;}
.conversation-toolbar.rx-desktop > ul.toolset-right > li.toolbar-search{display:block;}

@media only screen and (max-width:1050px) {

	#subscriptionsTab .conversation-toolbar.rx-desktop .toolset-left{display:none;}
	#subscriptionsTab .conversation-toolbar.rx-facade-back-to-profile,
	#subscriptionsTab .conversation-toolbar.rx-facade-subscription-count{display:block;}
	
	#subscribersTab .conversation-toolbar.rx-desktop .toolset-left{display:none;}
	#subscribersTab .conversation-toolbar.rx-facade-back-to-profile,
	#subscribersTab .conversation-toolbar.rx-facade-subscriber-count{display:block;}
	
	.conversation-toolbar.rx-desktop > ul.toolset-right > li.toolbar-search{display:none;}
	.profile-widget-layout .subscriptions-widget{min-width:332px;}

	#subscribersTab .conversation-toolbar.rx-facade-subscriber-count .subscribers-totalcount{margin-{vb:stylevar right}:20px;}
	
	<vb:comment>

	</vb:comment>
	.subscribeTabs .widget-tabs-panel .conversation-toolbar{margin-right:-1px;}
	.view-mode .widget-tabs .widget-tabs-nav{margin: 0 -1px -1px 0 !important;}
	#groupsTab{margin-right:-1px;}

}

@media only screen and (max-width:479px) {

}

<vb:comment>responsive:css - media queries:registration page</vb:comment>

@media only screen and (max-width:767px) {

#groups-tab .conversation-toolbar ul.toolset-left{display:block;}
.rx-facade-create-groups{display:none;}
.rx-facade-show-groups{display:none;}

@media only screen and (max-width:950px) {

}

@media only screen and (max-width:900px) {

}
